item.title: VL.StringExtensions
item.description: VL.StringExtensions adds super-useful string manipulation nodes to VL. You can easily do things such as verify if a string is a correctly formatted email address, append a suffix if it’s missing, or remove all special characters from a string. It simply wraps two .NET string extensions libraries : Jeff Klein’s String.Extensions Timothy Mugayi’s StringExtensions The plugin also contains simple overview help patches that show all the nodes in action.
